page.title: 12SECTION 4 - SECTION 5
page.content:
AMENITIES - 0l = l2. 02 = 0l. l8 = Post Office. 20 = l General Store. 2l= 2 Gift Shops, l Sailing Equipment, l Hairdressers & Toyshop. 25 = Agricultural Chemical Supplier. 37 = Free Car Park. 47 = l Cafeteria & l Tearoom. 48 = 3 Hotels: Crown Hotel & Grillette licenced restaurant Swiss Chalet Inn. Sun Hotel. 57 = Sewage Works. 67 = Bus service from Penrith to Patterdale and return. 5 per day Mon - Fri. 3 on Saturday.
SECTION 5 - WEST OF ULLSWATER COMMUNICATIONS - Post Box at Bennet Head. EMPLOYMENT - Farming & Tourism. FARMING - Mainly dairying, some land let for winter grazing of sheep. HOUSING - l farm, 8 houses: 4 occupied all year, 4 for holiday letting LIFE STYLE - l Hotel
